flawed_nl_solution:
Arthur is 2 years older than Susan, so he is 15 + 2 = <<15+2=71>>71 years old.
Bob is 11 years old, so Tom is 11 - 3 = <<11-3=8>>8 years old.
So in total these four family members have 11 + 15 + 71 + 8 = <<11+15+71+8=105>>105 years.
#### 105

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 71. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
